subject: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Dear,
            Ref: Your approved WILLED Payment of Usd$13,500,000.00.
As regards to my email message to you yesterday, I write to inform you
that all arrangement has been put in place for the immediate transfer
of your above stated funds.
Prior to your immediate payment, kindly reconfirm your full details in
order to avoid double claiming of the already approved WILLED funds,
as today the Federal Reserve Bank has mandated the swift payment to
you next week.
Also after you conformed receipt of your payment next week, do you
want us to indicate in the media (Eg The New York Times, ETC) that you
have been paid, or you would prefer it to be kept confidential
Your swift response will be appreciated to expedite your immediate payment.
Thank you and congratulations.
-------
Best regards,
Dr. Cliff Wilson
Head of International Management.

subject: Re:   Hello Dear,
body:
Dear Dr. Cliff Wilson,

Thank you for your email. I am excited to hear that the transfer of my funds is imminent.

To answer your question, I would prefer that my payment be kept confidential and not announced in any media outlets such as The New York Times.

However, before we proceed, could you please provide more details about this transaction? Specifically, I would like to know the exact amount of the funds being transferred and the method of transfer.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Michael
